about

...the website!

PSFLA is a website created by me (thepersonever) to host my mspaint adventures!
originally starting in 2024, PSFLA was first made with php. however, php sucks! so around may of 2025, i recreated it with 11ty!!

like most MSPAs, adventures on this site are largely user-driven. you prompt a character to do something, and they'll probably do it! you can submit a prompt via quickprompt, or by sending an ask to the tumblr blog :D

MSPAs excite me more than any other medium, due to having the flexibility of the web. change the css styling for the sake of the story! have an animation that fucks with the boarders of some divs! do the warioland shake it thing and have all of your text, images, and links fall off the page!!! you can do ANYTHING with a website you've created

the adventures on PSFLA takes heavy inspiration from andrew hussie's MSPAs, but i wouldn't call my adventures "fan adventures". is bioshock a fangame based off of half life 2

...the author!

hi i'm jade floase - aka the webmaster of a website that's linked on this page twice >_>;
i love using tech to make art, and perusing around the indie web! but you might already know that ;p

i don't know what else to write here
